on Ethereum L1, provides escape hatch for censored users Flow: 1. User submits transaction + bond to this contract on L1 2. Sequencer MUST include the transaction within INCLUSION_DEADLINE 3. If included: user can claim bond back with inclusion proof 4. If not included: user can reclaim bond + sequencer faces reputation damage This mechanism ensures users always have a path to inclusion, even if the sequencer attempts to censor specific transactions.","errors":{"EnforcedPause()":[{"details":"The operation failed because the contract is paused."}],"ExpectedPause()":[{"details":"The operation failed because the contract is not paused."}],"OwnableInvalidOwner(address)":[{"details":"The owner is not a valid owner account. dbb6528a88d","dweb:/ipfs/QmWyR5948uPZPJopp1bqHpd5DeTwDfJjdkagvN3WD8QL7J"]}},"version":1}

params._l2BlockNumber: L2 block where transaction was included

params._gasLimit: Gas limit for execution on L2

returns.txId: Unique identifier for this forced transaction

returns.circuitBreakerCapacity: Remaining capacity before circuit breaker trips

returns.isExpiredNow: Whether deadline has passed (and not resolved)

returns.limited: True if user is currently rate limited

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params._maxTxsPerUserPerHour: Maximum transactions per user per hour

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

INCLUSION_DEADLINE().notice: Time sequencer has to include forced transaction

MAX_GAS_LIMIT().notice: Maximum gas limit for forced transactions

MIN_BOND().notice: Minimum bond required to force inclusion

claimExpired(bytes32).notice: Claim bond back if transaction was not included before deadline

confirmInclusion(bytes32,uint256,bytes).notice: Confirm that a forced transaction was included on L2

forceTransaction(address,bytes,uint256).notice: Force a transaction to be included on L2

getExpirableTxs(uint256).notice: Get all expirable transactions (past deadline, not resolved)

getPendingCount().notice: Get the current pending transaction count

getTxDetails(bytes32).notice: Get transaction details with status info

getUserPendingTxs(address).notice: Get all pending forced transactions for a user

getUserSummary(address).notice: Get user's forced transaction history summary

isExpired(bytes32).notice: Check if a transaction has expired

isPending(bytes32).notice: Check if a transaction is pending (not yet resolved)

isRateLimited(address).notice: Check if user is rate limited

maxTxsPerUserPerHour().notice: Rate limit: max txs per user per hour

sequencerPenalties(address).notice: Sequencer reputation (negative points for missed inclusions)

txRootOracle().notice: Oracle for L2 transactions root by block number
